short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click icon to see milestone from crrev.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly see which milestone a Chromium CL is in. Click the icon from a tab with a crrev.com open. The milestone will appear in the popup after the icon is clicked.
